title: The 40-Point Club, Maddening Mike Evans, and the Sleeper Pool | The Dantasy Football Podcast
description:
Danny Kelly, Danny Heifetz, and Craig Horlbeck discuss the wildest fantasy scoring day in almost 70 years, how Christian McCaffrey’s season compares to LaDainian Tomlinson's 2006 season, and which of the top 10 receivers are here to stay. They then pick sleepers to beat each other’s sleepers on Sunday.



      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
